text: salamdeul-i geudeul-ege “hananimkkeseo naelisin geos-eul mid-eusio” lago malhal ttaemyeon geudeul-eun “ulineun uliege naelyeojin geos-eul midneundao” lago malhamyeo geu dwie issneun geos(kkulan)eul bulsinhana geugeos-eun geudeul-i gajin geos-eul hwagjeunghaneun jinlila. geudae(muhammadeu)neun malhala : ‘geudaedeul-i midneun jadeul-ilamyeon wae ijeon-e hananim-ui seonjijadeul-eul salhaehayeossneunga?’
